text: Purusiella hippomontanensis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Dalens, Touroult and Tavakilian in 2010. It is known from French Guiana.Purusiella hippomontanensis at World Cerambycidae. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 2010
title: Purusiella hippomontanensis
